github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: Follow Conventional Commits standard with format: <type>(<scope>): <subject>
Valid types are: feat, fix, docs, style, refactor, perf, test, chore, ci, build
Scope should be the affected module or component name
Use all lowercase in subject line
Start subject with appropriate gitmoji followed by a space
Limit subject line to 50 characters (excluding type/scope)
Separate subject from body with a blank line
Use imperative mood in subject line ('add' not 'adds')
Add footer with BREAKING CHANGE or Closes #123 if applicable
